      • makeThumbnails

        public static void makeThumbnails(java.lang.String inputPath,
                                  java.lang.String videoDuration,
                                  java.lang.String outputPath)
                           throws FfmpegException
        Makes a thumbnails of a video
        Parameters:
        inputPath - the path of the video
        videoDuration - the duration the video
        outputPath - where is save the thumbnails
        Throws:
        FfmpegException - if the thumbnails has not been generated

      • concatVideos

        public static void concatVideos(java.lang.String inputPath,
                                java.lang.String outputPath)
                         throws FfmpegException
        Generates the concatenation of videos
        Parameters:
        inputPath - where is the text file with the list of video
        outputPath - where is save the concatenation of video
        Throws:
        FfmpegException - is the concatenation has not been generated

      • getDuration

        public static int getDuration(java.lang.String path)
                       throws FfmpegException
        Gives the duration of a video
        Parameters:
        path - where is the video
        Returns:
        the duration of the video in seconds
        Throws:
        FfmpegException - if the video has not been found

      • formatVideo

        public static void formatVideo(java.lang.String inputPath,
                               java.lang.String outputPath)
                        throws FfmpegException
        Format a video into mp4
        Parameters:
        inputPath - where is the video to format
        outputPath - where is save the formatted videos
        Throws:
        FfmpegException - if the video to format has not been found or if the formatted video has not been generated
